nodes.text: Mastmots were a species of massive, furry, and friendly beasts of burden native to the frozen world of Toola. They had tusks which were prized for use in necklaces.

Mastmots were first created for Galaxy Guide 4: Alien Races, a Star Wars Legends supplement for West End Games Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game released in 1989 and written by Troy Denning. They were confirmed to be canon when mentioned in the reference book Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know, which was released in 2015.
